properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 9:12PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County

Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson
Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Alcovy River near High Point affecting Newton County

Big Haynes Creek near Milstead  affecting Newton and Rockdale
Counties

Yellow River near Rocky Plains affecting Newton County

Echeconnee Creek near Byron affecting Bibb...Crawford...Houston
and Peach Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Alcovy River near High Point.
* Until further notice.
* At 08PM Friday the stage was 11.4 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Flood stage is 11 feet.
* At 11 feet...Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of
woodlands and fields near the river upstream and downstream from
the gage on Henderson Mill Road. The water level reaches the first
wooden step behind an elevated private residence just upstream and
on the left bank from the bridge.
